reasoning: Umbrella term covering 13+ distinct orofaciodigital syndrome types. Aggregate incidence estimate derived from literature range of 1:50,000 to 1:250,000 live births, converting midpoint estimate to ~9 per 100k. Type I is most common (X-linked dominant, 75% sporadic cases, predominantly affects females). Confidence moderate-low due to heterogeneity of umbrella term and wide range of reported estimates.
source: Orphanet registry data; multiple literature sources reporting incidence range 1:50,000-1:250,000 live births
